description.originalText:
I always say that I’m so thankful to have family that lives close because I have quick access to childcare, but sometimes your family’s schedule gets busy too!

As a new mom, I was hesitant leaving my babygirl (and our puppy!) with someone new BUT Michaela eased all of my anxiety. She’s so gentle, nurturing and patient—you can tell she truly cares.

Her peaceful spirit is infectious and she’s so prompt when responding to my check in messages.

Michaela is a gem and our family is so grateful to have come across her!

Warmly, 
Kiara

I cannot express enough gratitude for the exceptional care provided by Michaela as a babysitter for my 8-year-old daughter. From the moment she arrived, it was evident that Michaela was not only punctual but also carried herself with utmost professionalism and respect. Her ability to instantly connect with my daughter was remarkable and put my mind at ease knowing my child was in capable hands.

Michaela's approach to childcare goes beyond just fulfilling duties; she creates a nurturing and engaging environment that fosters trust and comfort. Throughout her time with us, she consistently demonstrated patience, kindness, and a genuine interest in my daughter's well-being.

I wholeheartedly recommend Michaela to anyone in need of a dependable and caring babysitter. Her professionalism, reliability, and natural affinity with children make her an invaluable asset. With Michaela, I never had to worry, knowing my daughter was not only safe but also genuinely enjoying her time under her care.

Thank you, Michaela, for your outstanding service. You have undoubtedly made a positive impact on our family, and we look forward to having you babysit again in the future.
